original_title: The Making of a Hollywood Madam
overview: The real-life California family doctor -- facing a jail sentence for money laundering and tax evasion -- recalls the events leading to the arrest of his  notorious daughter, Hollywood madam Heidi Fleiss.
tagline: SHE WAS HOLLYWOOD'S FAVORITE MADAM... BUT SHE WAS ALSO HIS LITTLE GIRL.
title: The Making of a Hollywood Madam
